header.title: About Lumina
header.subtitle: We are a collective of strategists, engineers, and creatives building the future of the internet.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content_1: The digital landscape is fracturing. On one side, traditional Web2 businesses are struggling to adapt to AI and blockchain. On the other, Web3 projects often lack the polish and strategic rigor of established brands.
mission.content_2: Lumina exists to bridge this divide. We believe the future isn't about choosing between "old" and "new"â€”it's about intelligent integration. We bring the stability of enterprise strategy to the wild frontier of Web3, and the innovation of decentralized tech to traditional markets.

members.name: Alex Rivera
members.bio: Former VP of Marketing at TechGiant turned Web3 evangelist. Alex bridges the gap between corporate strategy and decentralized innovation.

members.name: Sarah Wu
members.bio: PhD in Machine Learning. Sarah leads our data science team, ensuring every campaign is backed by rigorous analysis.

members.name: Marcus Thorne
members.bio: Award-winning designer with a passion for generative art and immersive web experiences.

members.name: Elena Kova
members.bio: Early DeFi adopter and community builder. Elena understands the nuances of tokenomics and DAO governance.
